name: On the Other Side (Hishiro14)
description:
My first participation to the GMTK Game Jam ever! 

Started pretty late so got around 28h, but still happy to have submitted something! I went for a simplistic monochrome artstyle to save time and make enough levels.

WARNING : Game does not run on Google Chrome. Try using another navigator like Edge.

Pitch

Help Mika and Maki, each separated on one side of the mirror, join the other.

Controls (Keyboard / Gamepad)
  • Walk : Horizontal arrows / Left stick
  • Jump : Spacebar / South button (hold to jump higher)
Credits :
  • Nathan Mansard
  • Music : Kevin MacLeod - Sovereign
  • Made with Unity 2020.1.9
